meta.description:
In all of these simulations, you can edit EVERYTHING. Draw on the grid, modify the rules, add new emoji, even change these very words you're reading!

There is *no* difference between playing & making, between reading & writing.

Nice.

Let's start. Scroll down this sidebar to edit shtuff.

states.name: blank
states.description: Blank spots grow trees. (adjust the growth rate below!)

states.name: tree
states.description:
Trees just chill.

(P.S: To replace emoji, click the icon, and paste in a new emoji: ðŸ’© If you're on a Mac, you can hold down Control+Command+Space. Otherwise, copy-paste emoji from somewhere else like http://GetEmoji.com)
